action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#script
sleep(30)
Install-WindowsFeature -Name Failover-Clustering -IncludeManagementTools

#script
print "EXECUTION_MODE=LOCAL"

$Script = {

    Install-WindowsFeature -IncludeAllSubFeature -ErrorAction Stop "Net-Framework-Core"
    $DOMAINNAME=(Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain
    $setupDriveLetter = "D:"
    $setupPath = "$setupDriveLetter\setup.exe"
    $silentArgs = "/IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /Q /ACTION=install /FEATURES=SQLENGINE,REPLICATION,FULLTEXT,DQ,AS,RS,RS_SHP,RS_SHPWFE,DQC,CONN,IS,BC,SDK,BOL,SSMS,ADV_SSMS,DREPLAY_CTLR,DREPLAY_CLT,SNAC_SDK,MDS /AGTSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /AGTSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /SQLSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLSYSADMINACCOUNTS=`"$DOMAINNAME\Domain Admins`" /ISSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /ISSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /ASSYSADMINACCOUNTS=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /INSTANCEID=MSSQLSERVER /INSTANCENAME=MSSQLSERVER /UPDATEENABLED=False /INDICATEPROGRESS /TCPENABLED=1 /INSTALLSQLDATADIR=`"E:\MSSQL`" /SQLUSERDBLOGDIR=`"F:\MSSQL`" /SQLTEMPDBLOGDIR=`"F:\MSSQL`""
    $validExitCodes = @(0)

    $install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
    $install.WaitForExit()
    $exitCode = $install.ExitCode
    $install.Dispose()
    
    Write-Output "SQL Failover Cluster Installation exited with `'$exitCode`'."
      if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
          Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."

    }

}

$adminpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.secret}@@"
$Creds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential("@@{DOMAIN_CRED.username}@@",$adminpassword)

Invoke-Command -ComputerName @@{address}@@ -Credential $Creds -ScriptBlock $Script -Authentication Credssp

$Script = {

    Install-WindowsFeature -IncludeAllSubFeature -ErrorAction Stop "Net-Framework-Core"
    $DOMAINNAME=(Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain
    $setupDriveLetter = "D:"
    $setupPath = "$setupDriveLetter\setup.exe"
    $silentArgs = "/IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /Q /ACTION=install /FEATURES=SQLENGINE,REPLICATION,FULLTEXT,DQ,AS,RS,RS_SHP,RS_SHPWFE,DQC,CONN,IS,BC,SDK,BOL,SSMS,ADV_SSMS,DREPLAY_CTLR,DREPLAY_CLT,SNAC_SDK,MDS /AGTSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /AGTSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /SQLSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLSYSADMINACCOUNTS=`"$DOMAINNAME\Domain Admins`" /ISSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /ISSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /ASSYSADMINACCOUNTS=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /INSTANCEID=MSSQLSERVER /INSTANCENAME=MSSQLSERVER /UPDATEENABLED=False /INDICATEPROGRESS /TCPENABLED=1 /INSTALLSQLDATADIR=`"E:\MSSQL`" /SQLUSERDBLOGDIR=`"F:\MSSQL`" /SQLTEMPDBLOGDIR=`"F:\MSSQL`""
    $validExitCodes = @(0)

    $install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
    $install.WaitForExit()
    $exitCode = $install.ExitCode
    $install.Dispose()
    
    Write-Output "SQL Failover Cluster Installation exited with `'$exitCode`'."
      if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
          Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."

    }

}

$adminpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.secret}@@"
$Creds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential("@@{DOMAIN_CRED.username}@@",$adminpassword)

Invoke-Command -ComputerName @@{MSSQL2.address}@@ -Credential $Creds -ScriptBlock $Script -Authentication Credssp

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#script
sleep(90)

New-IscsiTargetPortal -TargetPortalAddress @@{PE_DATA_SERVICE_IP}@@
Get-IscsiTarget | Connect-IscsiTarget -IsPersistent $true

#Initialize Disks
Get-Disk -Number 1 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Get-Disk -Number 2 | Initialize-Disk -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

New-Partition -DiskNumber 1 -UseMaximumSize -DriveLetter E -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "Data" 
New-Partition -DiskNumber 2 -UseMaximumSize -DriveLetter F -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-Volume -Confirm:$false -FileSystem NTFS -NewFileSystemLabel "Logs"
Install-WindowsFeature -Name Failover-Clustering -IncludeManagementTools

attrs.script:
# -*- Pre-requisite to enable credssp and set 'Server' role
Enable-WSManCredSSP -Role Server -Force
# -*- Enabling and starting 'msiscsi'
Set-Service -Name msiscsi -StartupType Automatic
Start-Service msiscsi
# -*- Change first Ehternet adapter name to 'Production'
Get-NetAdapter -Name "Ethernet" | Rename-NetAdapter -NewName "Production" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
# -*- Create VG
